blogPost.excerpt: We designed Yak Tack to help you boost your vocabulary in a matter of days. We use a simple, scientifically proven technique called spaced repetition to get people past the "Ebbinghaus Forgetting Curve" when learning new words.
blogPost.body: We designed Yak Tack to help you boost your vocabulary in a matter of days. We use a simple, scientifically proven technique called spaced repetition to get people past the "Ebbinghaus Forgetting Curve" when learning new words.
blogPost.title: Yak Tack: Mobile App - Broaden your vocabulary. Simply.
blogPost.author: Jeremy Thomas

localize.description: 我们设计的Yak Tack可以帮助你在几天内增加词汇量。我们使用一种简单的、经过科学验证的技术，称为间隔重复，让人们在学习新单词时越过“艾宾豪斯遗忘曲线”。
localize.tagline: 扩大你的词汇量。很简单。

localize.description: 我們設計的Yak Tack可以幫助你在幾天內增加詞彙量。我們使用一種簡單的、經過科學驗證的技術，稱爲間隔重複，讓人們在學習新單詞時越過“艾賓豪斯遺忘曲線”。
localize.tagline: 擴大你的詞彙量。很簡單。

previous.excerpt: Postpace is a productivity platform for writers, bloggers, marketers and teams to automate their topic research workflow and rapidly build a content brief. Postpace helps study a topic by analyzing the top 15-20 organic results from Google for any keyword.
previous.title: Postpace - Productivity platform for writers, bloggers & teams

localize.description: Postpace是一个生产力平台，供作家、博客作者、营销人员和团队自动化他们的主题研究工作流程，并快速构建内容摘要。Postpace通过分析来自Google的任意关键字的前15-20个有机结果来帮助研究主题。
localize.tagline: 面向作家、博客作者和团队的生产力平台

localize.description: Postpace是一個生產力平臺，供作家、博客作者、營銷人員和團隊自動化他們的主題研究工作流程，並快速構建內容摘要。Postpace通過分析來自Google的任意關鍵字的前15-20個有機結果來幫助研究主題。
localize.tagline: 面向作家、博客作者和團隊的生產力平臺

next.excerpt: Choose a channel and let your mind wander with the continuous stream of videos we handpicked from the best YouTube creators. Relax with the natural images and sounds while you work, put on your TV or invite your friends to watch together.
next.title: Escapista - Curated videos to relax and explore the world from home.

localize.description: 选择一个频道，让你的大脑随着我们从最优秀的YouTube创作者那里精选的源源不断的视频流而漫游。当您工作、打开电视或邀请您的朋友一起观看时，享受自然的图像和声音让您放松。
localize.tagline: 精心策划的视频，让您在家中放松并探索世界。

localize.description: 選擇一個頻道，讓你的大腦隨着我們從最優秀的YouTube創作者那裏精選的源源不斷的視頻流而漫遊。當您工作、打開電視或邀請您的朋友一起觀看時，享受自然的圖像和聲音讓您放鬆。
localize.tagline: 精心策劃的視頻，讓您在家中放鬆並探索世界。
